sentences.sentence: Do you often have things happen to yourself and you dunt know what do you have in the future.
sentences.translation: 常常，你会因为发生在自己身上的事情，对未来的一切不知所措。

sentences.sentence: For boys the basic reaction you said to her: "You never eat health food for dinner , always eat some of the things with no nutrition, dunt buy to much, ok!"
sentences.translation: 出于男生基本反应你对她说：“你这孩子每次都不好好吃饭，总吃一些没有营养的东西，不要再买零食了喔！
